data.fullContent: Mary was nervous about the new phone system that was about to be set up in her office. It was a large system, and she was going to have to learn how it worked. She had been there for several years, and every time there was a change, it would take her a while to learn how it worked. She hoped this change wouldn't take as long as the last one. She hoped it wouldn't interfere with her job and that she wouldn't make too many errors. She was determined to learn as soon as possible so she could get back to work.

q1.translation: 玛丽对即将在她办公室安装的新的电话系统感到紧张。这是一个很大的系统，她要学习它是如何工作的。她已经在那里工作了好几年，每次有变化，她都要花一段时间来了解它是如何工作的。
